articles.title: The Dalai Lama created a Tibetan capital in exile in India. It's shrinking - NPR
articles.description: For decades, Tibetans built a capital in exile in Dharamshala, India, and sent their kids to a school founded by the Dalai Lama. That's now changing.
articles.content: DHARAMSHALA, India Boys and girls harmonize together as their music teacher Tenzin Nordel leads them through a Tibetan song in a classroom overlooking an alpine forest. Theater kids practice Tibetan … [+7490 chars]

articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: Lung cancer isn’t just a smoker’s disease, say oncologists and warn on early signs this awareness month - Times of India
articles.description: Lung Cancer Awareness Month highlights that this disease isn't just for smokers; pollution and genetics also play a role. Early symptoms like a persis
